评论概述: what you’d expect for the price
评论详情: The quality is what you would expect it to be for the cost. I needed something cheap but cute for my Halloween costume, and these were the perfect shoes. It looks exactly like the picture, you can tell the quality is pretty cheap but it’s still good for its price. The fit was a little too big, I got an 8 and I’m an 8 usually HOWEVER shoe sizes always vary, it might’ve been a fault on my part as I know my shoe size can vary a lot. I wouldn’t say it’s super comfortable or super uncomfortable, it’s the amount of comfort you’d typically get from those types of shoes. TLDR: it’s not the highest of quality but it’s pretty good for how cheap it is

just make sure when ur putting them on as not to step on the heart or it'll snap instantly i have a safety pin holding the straps together but none the less super comfy just be careful with the hearts

I thought these were adorable and I love them I do however have problems, for the price that's to be expected of course. 1: it creases very easily just one or two accidental tippy toes and the front is bent and creased. 2: the seams are visible but that is easily fixable with some paint. 3: if you don't pad your ankles you will suffer, even bandaids will help though I recommend friction padding. If you don't want blisters and redness I would highly recommend padding.
I would probably size one size down next time because they do run just a little big. But they still fit in my normal size just roomy. Good quality for price. Comfortable to wear.

They’re super cute but the straps will dig into your foot and the rivets are not on well and are very sharp, within 5 minutes of wearing them I had a few cuts from where the straps rivets dug in and shifted. The upper straps are also removable; however, the kept turning basically becoming a chain saw with the sharp rivets leaving scratches all along my ankle, they are not well made.

评论概述: Made out of glue and cardboard
评论详情: Listen I didn’t expect these to be super well made- I get it, it’s made in some factory in China with cheap parts. But nothing could have prepared me for when I saw it in person. As others have said- you can see the glue where it was glued together, the chunky heel feels like spray painted styrofoam and the shoe part itself felt like it was made from some kinda hard paper. Again, I didn’t need ultra durability, I’m not going hiking in these, but to call these “shoes” is a stretch lol don’t bother ordering these.
This would be the 2nd pair that I bought for my daughter. Shoes are super cute and she said very comfy. Unfortunately the strap has fallen off twice and this pair only lasted a month.

upon arrival they looked cute, however when I went to try them on buckling them up was a bit confusing, my friend and I had to work together to buckle one of the shoes. there should be some instructions if the buckles aren't going to be attached to the buckled end. overall the shoes are nice when I finally got to walk in them

Bought these for a goth event I'm attending, while I'm sure they'll work well for this event I'm also sure that after some more wear they would start falling apart because of the quality. For costumes or for occasional wear these are fine.

Versand erfolgte direkt aus China und dauerte einen Monat. Dann die Enttäuschung: Der Artikel fällt wenigstens zwei Nummer zu klein aus, und die Verarbeitung der Schuhe ist vollkommen mangelhaft (kamen bereits mit zerknicktem und eingedelltem Vorderfuß/Kappe an). Die Rücksendekosten nach China bei Widerruf erreichen annähernd den Verkaufspreis. Insofern: Ab in die Tonne und für's nächste Mal etwas gelernt...

Der Verkauf und die Rückabwicklung gingen problemlos. Wir benötigten die Standartgröße 41 und haben die 41, die 42 und in Folge die 43 bestellt. Alle drei Größen waren zu klein. Die 43 war sogar kleiner als die 41.

They feel pretty light and the quality is a bit « cheap » like Shein type thing, but durable enough to be worn on occasion without it falling apart. Definitely not an everyday shoe. I bought them to wear with certain outfits when I go out so it’s fine to me. Im usually on the smaller side of a size 6 and bought size 6 and they fit pretty well, just a tiny little bit loose, but the strap is there for that. Overall it was pretty much what I was expecting and am satisfied.

I'd give these no stars if I could. My daughter really wanted Mary Janes to go with her new school uniform for grade 09 and so she found these on Amazon and begged me to purchase them. I went against my gut after reading the reviews...the reviews were right. Absolute garbage. These shoes lasted 2 weeks. My kid is not hard on her shoes. The pin on the buckle broke first. So she used a safety pin for a bit. We were going to fix it. Then I realised how the bottom was coming apart. Not to mention how badly the top had creased. Just horrible shoes. Save your money, go purchase some nice ones that are better built to last. You get what you pay for...this is a prime example.

Je les adores

I really, really wanted these shoes; they fit fine; EXCEPT....they are not a buckle closure; they are velcro. This is the 2nd time a manufacturer has said they are a buckle closure and the buckle comes in a small plastic bag and is for show....there isn't even a proper way to attach the buckle to the shoe; just to the velcro strap.....if you want a buckle closure do not buy these. I have to send them back......I already have a pair with velcro and the problem is that after awhile the velcro wears out and they open up......

I was kind of expecting a bit more quality in this but it looked pretty cheap. I also noticed the shoe was already creased inside some how. The shoe looks cheap too and I can tell it’s not meant to be worn for more than a day without it somehow breaking. It’s probably best to be used just for photo shoots and that’s it. The bottom of the soles look slippery too so be weary.  Despite all that, IT IS CUTE THOUGH. If it was a more legitimate shoe, it is very cute. It looked cute on my feet and I loved that but I knew it would break really quick. Also I ordered my US size (7) and followed the size chart after measuring my foot and found it too small. I would have had really sore feet by the end of wearing them. I can even fit 6.5 sometimes but for some reason my food was squished in these.

梱包が雑でした。かわいい箱とかに入ってるわけでもなく、ただ段ボールにパンパンに入っている状態でした。 靴は厚底で一番高いところで6㎝、低いところで3㎝ほどです。 くるぶしあたりから上は2本のベルトで調節できます。きつくもできるしゆるくもできるので結構いいです。 靴の本底(地面に触れる部分)はスニーカーのようになっているわけでもなく平でもぼこぼこでもないです。(ちょっと全体的に凹凸がある) 靴自体はとてもかわいいのでいいと思います。値段相応の商品だと思います。 届いたばかりのレビューで使用していないので強度などはわかりません。
Schlechte Verarbeitung.  Schuhe sind viel zu klein. Habe Größe 43 bestellt, fühlte sich eher nach einer 41 an. Schade.

Bought these for my daughters graduation, in the first 15 minutes the buckle broke on the one shoe. I had to fix them the best I could as the graduation was the next day. They are very cute and my daughter loves them, it's just a shame that they broke right away.
Sind zwar etwas klein, aber passen noch da etwas breiter
